title._content: Image taken from page 73 of 'Récits d'Histoire de France, compiled by M. Seignobos. Edited with biographical and geographical index, explanatory notes and a vocabulary by A. Esclangon. ... With illustrations and maps. Sole authorised edition'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Récits d'Histoire de France, compiled by M. Seignobos. Edited with biographical and geographical index, explanatory notes and a vocabulary by A. Esclangon. ... With illustrations and maps. Sole authorised edition", "Histoire de France" Author: Michelet, Jules Contributor: Michelet, Jules Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9220.ccc.10." Volume: 01 Page: 73 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1889 Publisher: Hachette & Cie. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002483180 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
